feed.title: The Bhattacharya Lab for Computational Genomics

entry.title: isoTWAS preprint is updated on medRxiv

link.title: isoTWAS preprint is updated on medRxiv

entry.content: Check out our isoTWAS manuscript, updated on medRxiv, with increased functionality in our R package, greatly expanded sample sizes for our empirical analyses, and a larger number of complex traits studied.
entry.summary: Check out our isoTWAS manuscript, updated on medRxiv, with increased functionality in our R package, greatly expanded sample sizes for our empirical analyses, and a larger number of complex traits studied.
